class.name: MediaPipeGraphBuilder
class.brief_description: A class for building MediaPipe calculator graph.
class.description: [MediaPipeGraphBuilder] can be used to build calculator graphs with code at runtime.

method.name: get_config
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeGraphConfig] of the graph builder.

method.name: get_input_index
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeSource] of the graph by [param index].

method.name: get_input_tag
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeSource] of the graph by [param tag].

method.name: get_output_index
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeDestination] of the graph by [param index].

method.name: get_output_tag
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeDestination] of the graph by [param tag].
